## Government Tender Announcement Details
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

#### Document Details

* **Title**: Coastal Imaging, Habitat Classification, and Shoreline Assessment in Canada
* **Reference Number**: cb-313-99100395
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004325A
* **Publication Date**: June 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2024, 13:00:00

#### Request Details

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is open for bid and seeks to establish a Standing Offer (SO) with a qualified supplier to provide professional services for the design, implementation, review, and maintenance of coastal imaging and habitat classification data and products for all Canadian coasts.

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires a Contractor to utilize their expertise in coastal imaging, conducting aerial imaging and ground truthing surveys, and processing aerial imagery to produce open-source data products.

The goal is to support DFO in shoreline classification, species, habitat, and ecosystem vulnerability, and ocean protection. The Contractor will complete aerial imaging, stills, video, and ground truthing surveys, characterization and mapping of shoreline attributes, identification and characterization of biologically significant species and habitats, characterization of shoreline and nearshore species and habitats for wave exposure and oil residency indices, database creation and services, and publication of end products and reports.

The period of the Standing Offer will be from the date of the Standing Order issuance until August 31, 2029.

#### Procurement Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Pascal Busungu
* **Contact Email**: pascal.busungu@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (506) 429-6269

#### Attachment

The tender documents and attachments can be found through the following URL https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39823/30004325a---solicitation-addendum-3--addenda-3---bilingual.pdf
